definition: first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive
to hand over/to deliver/to pay (money)/to turn over/to make friends/to intersect (lines)/variant of 跤[jiao1]

sentences.english: This article is to investigate biorthogonal matrix-valued wavelet packets in higher dimensions.
sentences.chinese: 研究高维矩阵值双正交小波包的构造及性质。

sentences.english: The optimum recipe for ginger-cake processing was studied with orthogonal design.
sentences.chinese: 以正交实验研究了添加姜粉蛋糕的配方。

sentences.english: Orthogonality conditions of vibration mode functions for bars are derived.
sentences.chinese: 导出杆的主振型函数之正交性条件。

sentences.english: And introduce the DPD technology based on orthogonal sampling.
sentences.chinese: 并介绍了基于正交采样的DPD技术。

sentences.english: A kind of method for finding matrix image more easily appears in literature.
sentences.chinese: 在一些文献中出现了求解正交表矩阵象的简便方法。

sentences.english: Based on the Y-shaped cavity frequency splitting method, an orthogonal polarized He-Ne laser has been designed and implemented.
sentences.chinese: 研制了基于Y型腔结构的新型正交偏振氦氖激光器。

sentences.english: A method for determining the associated multiwavelets from a class of multi-scaling functions using the genetic algorithm is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 研究了利用遗传算法确定短序列正交多子波的方法。

sentences.english: Constructing orthonormal wavelet bases from splines is a method used often.
sentences.chinese: 通过样条函数构造小波正交基是常用的方法。

sentences.english: The gas nitriding technology of H13 steel was studied by an orthogonal test.
sentences.chinese: 运用正交试验法，研究H13钢气体渗氮工艺。

sentences.english: It can ensure unitary column orthogonality for the resulting matrix sequence.
sentences.chinese: 该方法可确保迭代矩阵列的单位列正交性。

sentences.english: And the optimum decoloring conditions for P. vulgaris polysaccharide was determined through orthogonal test.
sentences.chinese: 通过正交试验确定了夏枯草多糖脱色的最佳条件。

sentences.english: This method is an accurate one for the measurement of orthotropic rocks.
sentences.chinese: 本测定法对于正交各向异性体是一种精确的方法。

sentences.english: You should know what an orthonormal matrix is and a shortcut to compute its inverse.
sentences.chinese: 你应该知道什么是正交矩阵以及求它的逆的简单方法。

sentences.english: Two construction methods for orthonormal multiwavelets with multiplicity 2 based on scalar wavelets are given.
sentences.chinese: 给出了由单小波构造二元正交多小波的两种方法。

sentences.english: The new algorithm had less computation than orthogonal projection algorithm with the similar performance.
sentences.chinese: 该算法的计算量小于正交投影算法而性能相当。

sentences.english: The extraction technology of the polysaccharide from the green marine algae ulva lactuca l. was optimized with the orthogonal design.
sentences.chinese: 用正交设计法对绿藻石莼多糖成分提取工艺进行研究。
